meanings.definition: A person who walks along railroad tracks to inspect for damage or obstructions.
meanings.sent1: The trackwalkers found a broken rail during their inspection.
meanings.sent2: The company hired trackwalkers to ensure the safety of the train tracks.
meanings.sent3: The trackwalkers joked about finding a hidden treasure chest under the rails.
meanings.sent4: The trackwalkers were like detectives uncovering clues along the tracks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the trackwalkers diligently checking the rails stayed in my mind.
